All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlaView
This class creates a graphical representation of a "wing" (Ala) using JavaFX shapes.
BoardAdapter
Abstract class representing a board adapter for the game.
Boats
Class representing a boat in the game, including its type, location, and damaged parts.
Bomb
This class creates a graphical representation of a bomb using JavaFX shapes.
BotBoard
Represents the bot's game board, extending BoardAdapter.
DataFileHandler
Abstract class for handling data file operations, such as reading, writing, and serializing data.
DestructorView
This class creates a graphical representation of a destroyer ship using JavaFX shapes.
FailShot
This class represents a failed shot in the game.
Fire
This class represents a visual effect for a "fire" in the game.
GameController
GameController class manages the game's core logic, including players' boards and game mechanics.
GameException
Custom exception class for handling various game-related exceptions.
GameException.boatAlreadyUsed
Exception for handling attempts to use a boat that has already been used.
GameException.BoxAlreadyActivated
Exception for handling attempts to shoot a box that has already been shot.
GameException.CantDeleteFile
Exception for handling failures when deleting a file.
GameException.CantLoadMatch
Exception for handling failures when loading a match.
GameException.CantLoadProfile
Exception for handling failures when loading a profile.
GameException.CantSaveProfile
Exception for handling failures when saving a profile.
GameException.InaccessiblePartInBoat
Exception for handling attempts to access parts of a boat that are inaccessible.
GameException.NoBoardFound
Exception for handling situations where no board is found.
GameException.OccupiedBox
Exception for handling attempts to place a boat in an occupied space.
GameException.OutOfBoardAction
Exception for handling actions performed out of the board bounds.
GameException.OutOfBoardPosition
Exception for handling attempts to access a position out of board bounds.
GameException.profilesDoesNotExist
Exception for handling situations where profiles do not exist.
GameView
The GameView class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for the game window.

IBoard
Interface representing the operations available on a game board.
IData
Interface that defines the operations for handling data files, such as reading, writing, and serializing data.
Main
 
PlainTextGameData
Class for handling game data operations in plain text files.
PlayerBoard
Represents the player's game board, extending BoardAdapter.
PlayerDataHandler
Class for handling player data, including loading and saving profiles, scores, and board states.
SerializableGameData
Class for handling the serialization and deserialization of game data objects.

WelcomeController
Controller class for the Welcome view.
WelcomeView
La clase `WelcomeView` se encarga de mostrar la vista de bienvenida al inicio del juego.
